info.title: cs-insights-backend
info.description:
Specification JSONs: [v2](/api-spec/v2), [v3](/api-spec/v3).

API server of the cs-insights project. This is the main part of storing data and accessing an external data analysis endpoint. It uses a mongoDB instance to store everything.

message.example: Only admins can create new affiliations using the affiliation API
Only admins or the user itself can update affiliation properties
Only admins and the creator can delete an affiliation
Only admins can create new authors using the author API
Only admins or the user itself can update author properties
Only admins and the creator can delete an author

abstractText.example: This paper is about a really interesting topic

Only admins can create new venues using the venues API
